item.description:
This restaurant is one of my personal FAVORITES, and Scott has informed me that they now offer Half-Price Sundays!

Kim is going to be event host, but I am going to try to be there.

Kumo has delicious rolls, great traditional sushi, a really nice calm atmosphere (despite being in a great location right in New Haven). and there is even lots of free street parking on Sundays!

Come try these yummy special rolls, among others:
14. Yankee Roll - $17
Fluke, Salmon, White Tuna and Yellowtail Rolled, then lightly fried adorned with Tobiko, Scallions and Kumo Special Sauce

15. Sunflower Roll - $16
Salmon and Asparagus Roll, lightly fried and served with a Spicy Miso Sauce

16. Incredi-Roll - $17
Kani Tempura, Avocado and Cucumber topped with Tuna, Salmon and Yellowtail served with a New-Style Dipping Sauce


http://www.kumohibach...

item.name: Half Price Sundays at KUMO!
